ISSUE.TITLE: Documentation - configuration description
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In documentation page for configuration, there is misleading information - using dot in "OrchardCore.Media" which is deprecated instead of "OrchardCore_Media". Small improvement, but if someone is editing docs, it could be changed. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52829889/153576208-6b328af5-96e3-481d-9594-3901b21cc7ee.png) p.s. can I add label documentation somehow to this?
